subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Pitchers are usually not team leaders, because their workloads and pregame routines are so different from the position players’, but C.C. Sabathia has donned the mantle.
snippet: Pitchers are usually not team leaders, because their workloads and pregame routines are so different from the position players’, but C.C. Sabathia has donned the mantle.
